title: OnePlus confirms 150W charging is coming later this year, details ‘Hyperboost’ gaming features
content:
In a forum post today, OnePlus’ Pete Lau confirmed a few new details about the future of the brand, including that it has ditched plans to merge OxygenOS with Oppo’s experience. But just as exciting was the confirmation that OnePlus has a 150W charging spec coming later this year.

more…

The post OnePlus confirms 150W charging is coming later this year, details ‘Hyperboost’ gaming features appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: On at least one device launching in Q2 2022, OnePlus will support charging speeds of 150W using "SuperVOOC" technology.
